						 from   syscolumns 
						 join   sysindexkeys on syscolumns.id  =sysindexkeys.id and syscolumns.colid=sysindexkeys.colid and syscolumns.id=sys.columns.object_id 
						 join   sysindexes   on syscolumns.id  =sysindexes.id   and sysindexkeys.indid=sysindexes.indid   
						 join   sysobjects   on sysindexes.name=sysobjects.name and sysobjects.xtype= 'PK '
						 where syscolumns.name = sys.columns.name) then 1 else 0 end) AS IsPrimaryKey,
		(select value from sys.extended_properties where sys.extended_properties.major_id = sys.columns.object_id and sys.extended_properties.minor_id = sys.columns.column_id) as Description
FROM sys.columns    
WHERE sys.columns.object_id = object_id('sys_parameter')
ORDER BY sys.columns.column_id

						 where syscolumns.name = sys.columns.name) then 1 else 0 end) AS IsPrimaryKey,
		(select value from sys.extended_properties where sys.extended_properties.major_id = sys.columns.object_id and sys.extended_properties.minor_id = sys.columns.column_id) as Description
FROM sys.columns    
WHERE sys.columns.object_id = object_id('sys_permission')
ORDER BY sys.columns.column_id

		type_name(sys.columns.system_type_id)	AS SqlTypeName,
		sys.columns.max_length					AS MaxLength,
		sys.columns.is_nullable					AS IsNullable,
		sys.columns.is_identity					AS IsIdentity,
		(case when exists(select 1  
						 from   syscolumns 
						 join   sysindexkeys on syscolumns.id  =sysindexkeys.id and syscolumns.colid=sysindexkeys.colid and syscolumns.id=sys.columns.object_id 
						 join   sysindexes   on syscolumns.id  =sysindexes.id   and sysindexkeys.indid=sysindexes.indid

2013-09-04 22:42:47,270 [14724] DEBUG Sys - 
select 1
from sys_roleMenuMap A
left join sys_userRoleMap B on B.RoleCode = A.RoleCode
left join sys_menu C on C.MenuCode = A.MenuCode
where B.UserCode = 'lhs'
and C.URL in ('/Sys/generator/Index','/Sys/generator')

						 from   syscolumns 
						 join   sysindexkeys on syscolumns.id  =sysindexkeys.id and syscolumns.colid=sysindexkeys.colid and syscolumns.id=sys.columns.object_id 
						 join   sysindexes   on syscolumns.id  =sysindexes.id   and sysindexkeys.indid=sysindexes.indid   
						 join   sysobjects   on sysindexes.name=sysobjects.name and sysobjects.xtype= 'PK '
						 where syscolumns.name = sys.columns.name) then 1 else 0 end) AS IsPrimaryKey,
		(select value from sys.extended_properties where sys.extended_properties.major_id = sys.columns.object_id and sys.extended_properties.minor_id = sys.columns.column_id) as Description
FROM sys.columns    
WHERE sys.columns.object_id = object_id('mms_project')
ORDER BY sys.columns.column_id

2013-09-04 22:48:50,814 [10584] DEBUG Sys - 
select 1
from sys_roleMenuMap A
left join sys_userRoleMap B on B.RoleCode = A.RoleCode
left join sys_menu C on C.MenuCode = A.MenuCode
where B.UserCode = 'lhs'
and C.URL in ('/Sys/generator/Index','/Sys/generator')

		sys.columns.max_length					AS MaxLength,
		sys.columns.is_nullable					AS IsNullable,
		sys.columns.is_identity					AS IsIdentity,
		(case when exists(select 1  
						 from   syscolumns 
						 join   sysindexkeys on syscolumns.id  =sysindexkeys.id and syscolumns.colid=sysindexkeys.colid and syscolumns.id=sys.columns.object_id 
						 join   sysindexes   on syscolumns.id  =sysindexes.id   and sysindexkeys.indid=sysindexes.indid   
						 join   sysobjects   on sysindexes.name=sysobjects.name and sysobjects.xtype= 'PK '
						 where syscolumns.name = sys.columns.name) then 1 else 0 end) AS IsPrimaryKey,
		(select value from sys.extended_properties where sys.extended_properties.major_id = sys.columns.object_id and sys.extended_properties.minor_id = sys.columns.column_id) as Description
FROM sys.columns    
WHERE sys.columns.object_id = object_id('mms_material')
ORDER BY sys.columns.column_id

		(select value from sys.extended_properties where sys.extended_properties.major_id = sys.columns.object_id and sys.extended_properties.minor_id = sys.columns.column_id) as Description
FROM sys.columns    
WHERE sys.columns.object_id = object_id('sys_roleMenuButtonMap')
ORDER BY sys.columns.column_id
2013-09-04 22:52:30,016 [13924] DEBUG Sys - 
select 1
from sys_roleMenuMap A
left join sys_userRoleMap B on B.RoleCode = A.RoleCode
left join sys_menu C on C.MenuCode = A.MenuCode
where B.UserCode = 'lhs'
and C.URL in ('/Sys/generator/Index','/Sys/generator')

2013-09-04 22:52:34,469 [11244] DEBUG Mms - 
SELECT	sys.columns.name						AS ColumnName, 
		type_name(sys.columns.system_type_id)	AS SqlTypeName,
		sys.columns.max_length					AS MaxLength,
		sys.columns.is_nullable					AS IsNullable,
		sys.columns.is_identity					AS IsIdentity,
		(case when exists(select 1  
						 from   syscolumns 
						 join   sysindexkeys on syscolumns.id  =sysindexkeys.id and syscolumns.colid=sysindexkeys.colid and syscolumns.id=sys.columns.object_id 
						 join   sysindexes   on syscolumns.id  =sysindexes.id   and sysindexkeys.indid=sysindexes.indid   
						 join   sysobjects   on sysindexes.name=sysobjects.name and sysobjects.xtype= 'PK '
						 where syscolumns.name = sys.columns.name) then 1 else 0 end) AS IsPrimaryKey,
		(select value from sys.extended_properties where sys.extended_properties.major_id = sys.columns.object_id and sys.extended_properties.minor_id = sys.columns.column_id) as Description
FROM sys.columns    
WHERE sys.columns.object_id = object_id('mms_material')
ORDER BY sys.columns.column_id

						 join   sysindexes   on syscolumns.id  =sysindexes.id   and sysindexkeys.indid=sysindexes.indid   
						 join   sysobjects   on sysindexes.name=sysobjects.name and sysobjects.xtype= 'PK '
						 where syscolumns.name = sys.columns.name) then 1 else 0 end) AS IsPrimaryKey,
		(select value from sys.extended_properties where sys.extended_properties.major_id = sys.columns.object_id and sys.extended_properties.minor_id = sys.columns.column_id) as Description
FROM sys.columns    
WHERE sys.columns.object_id = object_id('sys_menuButtonMap')
ORDER BY sys.columns.column_id

2013-09-04 22:57:33,771 [11252] DEBUG Sys - 
select 1
from sys_roleMenuMap A
left join sys_userRoleMap B on B.RoleCode = A.RoleCode
left join sys_menu C on C.MenuCode = A.MenuCode
where B.UserCode = 'lhs'
and C.URL in ('/Sys/generator/Index','/Sys/generator')

						 join   sysindexkeys on syscolumns.id  =sysindexkeys.id and syscolumns.colid=sysindexkeys.colid and syscolumns.id=sys.columns.object_id 
						 join   sysindexes   on syscolumns.id  =sysindexes.id   and sysindexkeys.indid=sysindexes.indid   
						 join   sysobjects   on sysindexes.name=sysobjects.name and sysobjects.xtype= 'PK '
						 where syscolumns.name = sys.columns.name) then 1 else 0 end) AS IsPrimaryKey,
		(select value from sys.extended_properties where sys.extended_properties.major_id = sys.columns.object_id and sys.extended_properties.minor_id = sys.columns.column_id) as Description
FROM sys.columns    
WHERE sys.columns.object_id = object_id('mms_lossReportDetail')
ORDER BY sys.columns.column_id

						 join   sysobjects   on sysindexes.name=sysobjects.name and sysobjects.xtype= 'PK '
						 where syscolumns.name = sys.columns.name) then 1 else 0 end) AS IsPrimaryKey,
		(select value from sys.extended_properties where sys.extended_properties.major_id = sys.columns.object_id and sys.extended_properties.minor_id = sys.columns.column_id) as Description
FROM sys.columns    
WHERE sys.columns.object_id = object_id('mms_material')
ORDER BY sys.columns.column_id

		(select value from sys.extended_properties where sys.extended_properties.major_id = sys.columns.object_id and sys.extended_properties.minor_id = sys.columns.column_id) as Description
FROM sys.columns    
WHERE sys.columns.object_id = object_id('mms_materialType')
ORDER BY sys.columns.column_id

		sys.columns.max_length					AS MaxLength,
		sys.columns.is_nullable					AS IsNullable,
		sys.columns.is_identity					AS IsIdentity,
		(case when exists(select 1  
						 from   syscolumns 
						 join   sysindexkeys on syscolumns.id  =sysindexkeys.id and syscolumns.colid=sysindexkeys.colid and syscolumns.id=sys.columns.object_id 
						 join   sysindexes   on syscolumns.id  =sysindexes.id   and sysindexkeys.indid=sysindexes.indid

		(select value from sys.extended_properties where sys.extended_properties.major_id = sys.columns.object_id and sys.extended_properties.minor_id = sys.columns.column_id) as Description
FROM sys.columns    
WHERE sys.columns.object_id = object_id('mms_merchants')
ORDER BY sys.columns.column_id

SELECT	sys.columns.name						AS ColumnName, 
		type_name(sys.columns.system_type_id)	AS SqlTypeName,
		sys.columns.max_length					AS MaxLength,
		sys.columns.is_nullable					AS IsNullable,
		sys.columns.is_identity					AS IsIdentity,
		(case when exists(select 1  
						 from   syscolumns 
						 join   sysindexkeys on syscolumns.id  =sysindexkeys.id and syscolumns.colid=sysindexkeys.colid and syscolumns.id=sys.columns.object_id 
						 join   sysindexes   on syscolumns.id  =sysindexes.id   and sysindexkeys.indid=sysindexes.indid   
						 join   sysobjects   on sysindexes.name=sysobjects.name and sysobjects.xtype= 'PK '
						 where syscolumns.name = sys.columns.name) then 1 else 0 end) AS IsPrimaryKey,
		(select value from sys.extended_properties where sys.extended_properties.major_id = sys.columns.object_id and sys.extended_properties.minor_id = sys.columns.column_id) as Description
FROM sys.columns

select 1
from sys_roleMenuMap A
left join sys_userRoleMap B on B.RoleCode = A.RoleCode
left join sys_menu C on C.MenuCode = A.MenuCode
where B.UserCode = 'lhs'
and C.URL in ('/Sys/generator/Index','/Sys/generator')

SELECT	sys.columns.name						AS ColumnName, 
		type_name(sys.columns.system_type_id)	AS SqlTypeName,
		sys.columns.max_length					AS MaxLength,
		sys.columns.is_nullable					AS IsNullable,
		sys.columns.is_identity					AS IsIdentity,
		(case when exists(select 1  
						 from   syscolumns 
						 join   sysindexkeys on syscolumns.id  =sysindexkeys.id and syscolumns.colid=sysindexkeys.colid and syscolumns.id=sys.columns.object_id 
						 join   sysindexes   on syscolumns.id  =sysindexes.id   and sysindexkeys.indid=sysindexes.indid   
						 join   sysobjects   on sysindexes.name=sysobjects.name and sysobjects.xtype= 'PK '
						 where syscolumns.name = sys.columns.name) then 1 else 0 end) AS IsPrimaryKey,
		(select value from sys.extended_properties where sys.extended_properties.major_id = sys.columns.object_id and sys.extended_properties.minor_id = sys.columns.column_id) as Description
FROM sys.columns    
WHERE sys.columns.object_id = object_id('mms_project')
ORDER BY sys.columns.column_id
2013-09-04 23:20:10,559 [16788] DEBUG Sys - 
select 1
from sys_roleMenuMap A
left join sys_userRoleMap B on B.RoleCode = A.RoleCode
left join sys_menu C on C.MenuCode = A.MenuCode
where B.UserCode = 'lhs'
and C.URL in ('/Sys/generator/Index','/Sys/generator')
2013-09-04 23:20:22,032 [9996] DEBUG Mms - SELECT Name as TableName FROM sys.tables order by Name
2013-09-04 23:20:23,952 [9996] DEBUG Mms - 
SELECT	sys.columns.name						AS ColumnName, 
		type_name(sys.columns.system_type_id)	AS SqlTypeName,
		sys.columns.max_length					AS MaxLength,
		sys.columns.is_nullable					AS IsNullable,
		sys.columns.is_identity					AS IsIdentity,
		(case when exists(select 1  
						 from   syscolumns 
						 join   sysindexkeys on syscolumns.id  =sysindexkeys.id and syscolumns.colid=sysindexkeys.colid and syscolumns.id=sys.columns.object_id 
						 join   sysindexes   on syscolumns.id  =sysindexes.id   and sysindexkeys.indid=sysindexes.indid   
						 join   sysobjects   on sysindexes.name=sysobjects.name and sysobjects.xtype= 'PK '
						 where syscolumns.name = sys.columns.name) then 1 else 0 end) AS IsPrimaryKey,
		(select value from sys.extended_properties where sys.extended_properties.major_id = sys.columns.object_id and sys.extended_properties.minor_id = sys.columns.column_id) as Description
FROM sys.columns    
WHERE sys.columns.object_id = object_id('mms_material')
ORDER BY sys.columns.column_id

ORDER BY sys.columns.column_id
2013-09-04 23:21:55,588 [13672] DEBUG Mms - 
SELECT	sys.columns.name						AS ColumnName, 
		type_name(sys.columns.system_type_id)	AS SqlTypeName,
		sys.columns.max_length					AS MaxLength,
		sys.columns.is_nullable					AS IsNullable,
		sys.columns.is_identity					AS IsIdentity,
		(case when exists(select 1  
						 from   syscolumns 
						 join   sysindexkeys on syscolumns.id  =sysindexkeys.id and syscolumns.colid=sysindexkeys.colid and syscolumns.id=sys.columns.object_id 
						 join   sysindexes   on syscolumns.id  =sysindexes.id   and sysindexkeys.indid=sysindexes.indid   
						 join   sysobjects   on sysindexes.name=sysobjects.name and sysobjects.xtype= 'PK '
						 where syscolumns.name = sys.columns.name) then 1 else 0 end) AS IsPrimaryKey,
		(select value from sys.extended_properties where sys.extended_properties.major_id = sys.columns.object_id and sys.extended_properties.minor_id = sys.columns.column_id) as Description
FROM sys.columns    
WHERE sys.columns.object_id = object_id('mms_material')
ORDER BY sys.columns.column_id

2013-09-04 23:23:40,270 [16060] DEBUG Sys - 
select 1
from sys_roleMenuMap A
left join sys_userRoleMap B on B.RoleCode = A.RoleCode
left join sys_menu C on C.MenuCode = A.MenuCode
where B.UserCode = 'lhs'
and C.URL in ('/Sys/generator/Index','/Sys/generator')

		(select value from sys.extended_properties where sys.extended_properties.major_id = sys.columns.object_id and sys.extended_properties.minor_id = sys.columns.column_id) as Description
FROM sys.columns    
WHERE sys.columns.object_id = object_id('mms_dealDetail')
ORDER BY sys.columns.column_id

SELECT	sys.columns.name						AS ColumnName, 
		type_name(sys.columns.system_type_id)	AS SqlTypeName,
		sys.columns.max_length					AS MaxLength,
		sys.columns.is_nullable					AS IsNullable,
		sys.columns.is_identity					AS IsIdentity,
		(case when exists(select 1  
						 from   syscolumns 
						 join   sysindexkeys on syscolumns.id  =sysindexkeys.id and syscolumns.colid=sysindexkeys.colid and syscolumns.id=sys.columns.object_id 
						 join   sysindexes   on syscolumns.id  =sysindexes.id   and sysindexkeys.indid=sysindexes.indid   
						 join   sysobjects   on sysindexes.name=sysobjects.name and sysobjects.xtype= 'PK '
						 where syscolumns.name = sys.columns.name) then 1 else 0 end) AS IsPrimaryKey,
		(select value from sys.extended_properties where sys.extended_properties.major_id = sys.columns.object_id and sys.extended_properties.minor_id = sys.columns.column_id) as Description
FROM sys.columns

2013-09-04 23:29:06,484 [17416] DEBUG Sys - 
select 1
from sys_roleMenuMap A
left join sys_userRoleMap B on B.RoleCode = A.RoleCode
left join sys_menu C on C.MenuCode = A.MenuCode
where B.UserCode = 'lhs'
and C.URL in ('/Sys/generator/Index','/Sys/generator')
2013-09-04 23:29:11,559 [11732] DEBUG Mms - SELECT Name as TableName FROM sys.tables order by Name

						 join   sysindexes   on syscolumns.id  =sysindexes.id   and sysindexkeys.indid=sysindexes.indid   
						 join   sysobjects   on sysindexes.name=sysobjects.name and sysobjects.xtype= 'PK '
						 where syscolumns.name = sys.columns.name) then 1 else 0 end) AS IsPrimaryKey,
		(select value from sys.extended_properties where sys.extended_properties.major_id = sys.columns.object_id and sys.extended_properties.minor_id = sys.columns.column_id) as Description
FROM sys.columns    
WHERE sys.columns.object_id = object_id('mms_lossReportBatches')
ORDER BY sys.columns.column_id

						 join   sysindexes   on syscolumns.id  =sysindexes.id   and sysindexkeys.indid=sysindexes.indid   
						 join   sysobjects   on sysindexes.name=sysobjects.name and sysobjects.xtype= 'PK '
						 where syscolumns.name = sys.columns.name) then 1 else 0 end) AS IsPrimaryKey,
		(select value from sys.extended_properties where sys.extended_properties.major_id = sys.columns.object_id and sys.extended_properties.minor_id = sys.columns.column_id) as Description
FROM sys.columns    
WHERE sys.columns.object_id = object_id('mms_lossReportBatches')
ORDER BY sys.columns.column_id

						 join   sysindexes   on syscolumns.id  =sysindexes.id   and sysindexkeys.indid=sysindexes.indid   
						 join   sysobjects   on sysindexes.name=sysobjects.name and sysobjects.xtype= 'PK '
						 where syscolumns.name = sys.columns.name) then 1 else 0 end) AS IsPrimaryKey,
		(select value from sys.extended_properties where sys.extended_properties.major_id = sys.columns.object_id and sys.extended_properties.minor_id = sys.columns.column_id) as Description
FROM sys.columns    
WHERE sys.columns.object_id = object_id('mms_lossReportBatches')
ORDER BY sys.columns.column_id

						 where syscolumns.name = sys.columns.name) then 1 else 0 end) AS IsPrimaryKey,
		(select value from sys.extended_properties where sys.extended_properties.major_id = sys.columns.object_id and sys.extended_properties.minor_id = sys.columns.column_id) as Description
FROM sys.columns    
WHERE sys.columns.object_id = object_id('mms_material')
ORDER BY sys.columns.column_id
2013-09-04 23:33:38,832 [3024] DEBUG Mms - 
SELECT	sys.columns.name						AS ColumnName, 
		type_name(sys.columns.system_type_id)	AS SqlTypeName,
		sys.columns.max_length					AS MaxLength,
		sys.columns.is_nullable					AS IsNullable,
		sys.columns.is_identity					AS IsIdentity,
		(case when exists(select 1  
						 from   syscolumns 
						 join   sysindexkeys on syscolumns.id  =sysindexkeys.id and syscolumns.colid=sysindexkeys.colid and syscolumns.id=sys.columns.object_id 
						 join   sysindexes   on syscolumns.id  =sysindexes.id   and sysindexkeys.indid=sysindexes.indid   
						 join   sysobjects   on sysindexes.name=sysobjects.name and sysobjects.xtype= 'PK '
						 where syscolumns.name = sys.columns.name) then 1 else 0 end) AS IsPrimaryKey,
		(select value from sys.extended_properties where sys.extended_properties.major_id = sys.columns.object_id and sys.extended_properties.minor_id = sys.columns.column_id) as Description
FROM sys.columns    
WHERE sys.columns.object_id = object_id('mms_material')
ORDER BY sys.columns.column_id

		sys.columns.max_length					AS MaxLength,
		sys.columns.is_nullable					AS IsNullable,
		sys.columns.is_identity					AS IsIdentity,
		(case when exists(select 1  
						 from   syscolumns 
						 join   sysindexkeys on syscolumns.id  =sysindexkeys.id and syscolumns.colid=sysindexkeys.colid and syscolumns.id=sys.columns.object_id 
						 join   sysindexes   on syscolumns.id  =sysindexes.id   and sysindexkeys.indid=sysindexes.indid   
						 join   sysobjects   on sysindexes.name=sysobjects.name and sysobjects.xtype= 'PK '
						 where syscolumns.name = sys.columns.name) then 1 else 0 end) AS IsPrimaryKey,
		(select value from sys.extended_properties where sys.extended_properties.major_id = sys.columns.object_id and sys.extended_properties.minor_id = sys.columns.column_id) as Description
FROM sys.columns    
WHERE sys.columns.object_id = object_id('mms_lossReportBatches')

2013-09-04 23:36:10,916 [9672] DEBUG Sys - select * from sys_userSetting where UserCode='lhs'
2013-09-04 23:36:11,766 [12508] DEBUG Sys - 
--角色的菜单
select distinct B.*
from sys_roleMenuMap A
inner join sys_menu  B on B.MenuCode = A.MenuCode
where B.IsEnable='1'
  and RoleCode in (
  select RoleCode from sys_userRoleMap where UserCode = 'lhs' --用户的角色
union all
  select RoleCode from sys_organizeRoleMap where OrganizeCode in  --机构的角色
  (
	select OrganizeCode from sys_userOrganizeMap where UserCode = 'lhs'
  )  
)
order by B.MenuSeq,B.MenuCode
2013-09-04 23:36:12,281 [9672] DEBUG Sys - 
select 1
from sys_roleMenuMap A
left join sys_userRoleMap B on B.RoleCode = A.RoleCode
left join sys_menu C on C.MenuCode = A.MenuCode
where B.UserCode = 'lhs'
and C.URL in ('/Sys/generator/Index','/Sys/generator')
2013-09-04 23:36:16,826 [1608] DEBUG Mms - SELECT Name as TableName FROM sys.tables order by Name
2013-09-04 23:36:17,806 [1936] DEBUG Mms - 
SELECT	sys.columns.name						AS ColumnName, 
		type_name(sys.columns.system_type_id)	AS SqlTypeName,
		sys.columns.max_length					AS MaxLength,
		sys.columns.is_nullable					AS IsNullable,
		sys.columns.is_identity					AS IsIdentity,
		(case when exists(select 1  
						 from   syscolumns 
						 join   sysindexkeys on syscolumns.id  =sysindexkeys.id and syscolumns.colid=sysindexkeys.colid and syscolumns.id=sys.columns.object_id 
						 join   sysindexes   on syscolumns.id  =sysindexes.id   and sysindexkeys.indid=sysindexes.indid   
						 join   sysobjects   on sysindexes.name=sysobjects.name and sysobjects.xtype= 'PK '
						 where syscolumns.name = sys.columns.name) then 1 else 0 end) AS IsPrimaryKey,
		(select value from sys.extended_properties where sys.extended_properties.major_id = sys.columns.object_id and sys.extended_properties.minor_id = sys.columns.column_id) as Description
FROM sys.columns    
WHERE sys.columns.object_id = object_id('mms_material')
ORDER BY sys.columns.column_id
